changes: The original proposed plan was valid and correctly followed all style constraints.
Refined 'bed_1' placement to specifically mention positioning it between the low windows visible on the south wall for better visual integration.
Updated 'sofa_1' instruction to include a specific walkway clearance (2-3 feet) for practical traffic flow.
Modified 'artwork_2' placement to suggest centering it on the now-open east wall for better room balance, rather than a vague placement.
Enhanced the 'rug_1' description to specify its size relative to the furniture it anchors, which is a key design principle for defining a space.
Added a practical note for 'chair_1' and 'chair_2' to be pushed in to save space in the compact room.
Overall, instructions were made more specific to reflect professional interior design standards for spacing, balance, and zone definition.

refined_placements.bed_1: Centered on the south wall, with the headboard positioned between the two low windows, serving as the focal point when entering the room.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Positioned to the left of the head of bed_1, against the south wall.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Positioned to the right of the head of bed_1, against the south wall.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Positioned at the foot of bed_1, facing the bed to form a unified lounging area. Ensure a 2-3 foot walkway between the sofa and the bed for comfortable passage.
refined_placements.table_1: Tucked into the southwest corner of the room, keeping the main walkway from the entrance clear and out of the primary sightline.
refined_placements.chair_1: Placed at table_1. Keep tucked under when not in use to maximize floor space.
refined_placements.chair_2: Placed at table_1. Keep tucked under when not in use to maximize floor space.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above table_1 to create a distinct work/dining vignette.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Center a large piece of art on the now-open east wall to visually balance the room.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the northeast corner, adding life and filling the space between the main living area and the bathroom entrance.
refined_placements.rug_1: Place a large area rug centered under the bed and sofa combination, extending at least 24 inches beyond the sides and foot to anchor the entire relaxation zone.
refined_placements.rug_2: Place a smaller rug under table_1 and its chairs to visually define the work/dining zone.
